618698559093895168.text: And I'm sure we all understand and assume our historical responsibility. Thank you. #Greece #EPlenary #olomeleiaEK

618698447726710784.text: Now we are called upon to find a fertile & honest compromise in order to avoid a historic rupture that will overturn the EE tradition

618698213697155072.text: Our proposals focus on reforms to change Greece, reforms that the Memoranda did not want to make.

618697705708257280.text: According to a survey by Crédit Suisse, 10% of the Greeks manage 56% of the national wealth. #Greece #EPlenary #olomeleiaEK

618697383308849152.text: Previous governments created a clientele state, strengthened corruption and interdependence with economic power #Greece

618697136947990528.text: I am not one of the politicians who claim that all the misery of Greece is blame for foreigners. #Greece #EPlenary #olomeleiaEK

618696900938715137.text: Our proposals for financing our commitments & restructuring our debt do not burden the European taxpayer.

618696689772306432.text: It includes a commitment to launch a substantive debate on tackling the viability of the Greek public debt

618696439921811456.text: It includes a strong development program, primarily to fight unemployment and encourage entrepreneurship #Greece

618696264939651072.text: Includes adequate coverage of the country's financial needs #Greece #EPlenary #olomeleiaEK

618696170223890432.text: Our proposal to the institutions includes: credible reforms on the basis of fair burden sharing #Greece #EPlenary

618695780774363137.text: The majority of the Greek people feel that they have no choice but to get rid of this impasse. #Eplenary #Greece

618695605439889408.text: My homeland was transformed into an experimental austerity workshop. The experiment, however, has to be admitted, failed. #EPlenary #olomeleiaEK

618694658793803776.text: The brave choice of the Greek people, under unprecedented pressure, is not a choice of rupture with Europe. #Greece #EPlenary #olomeleiaEK

618694205381214208.text: Thank you for the invitation and the honor to address the elected representatives of the peoples of Europe. #Greece #EPlenary #olomeleiaEK

617795536989614081.text: With a strong ally the faith of our people in his powers. With a strong ally of democracy and the right that is on our side. #Greece

617795446677872640.text: Today we celebrate the victory of democracy. From tomorrow we all together continue & complete the National effort for a route agreement.

617795275067891712.text: Immediately afterwards, I will visit the President of the Republic and ask him tomorrow morning to convene the Political Leaders Council. #Greece

617795136660078592.text: This time, the place needs more than ever unity and coherence, unity and sincere understanding to overcome the difficulties.

617794901149884416.text: This time on the negotiating table will be the issue of debt, how much even when the IMF itself in its report admits it

617794699563270144.text: Our immediate priority is to quickly restore our banking system and our financial stability.

617794623407300608.text: The Greek people today answered the question: What Europe do we want. And he replied: We want a Europe of solidarity and democracy.

617794480868098048.text: With his historic and courageous choice, the Greek people responded to the right question and at the same time changed the question of dialogue in Europe

617794265092112385.text: We know that there are no easy solutions. However, there are fair solutions. There are viable solutions. It is a matter for both sides

617794052864540672.text: The mandate you give me is not a rupture order with Europe but a mandate to strengthen our negotiating power. #Greece #dimopsifisma

617793513057554432.text: Today's #dimopsifisma has no winners and losers. It is a great victory in itself. #Greece

83282535076986881.text: "This government has been judged to handle the most difficult situation in recent decades"

83282237101060096.text: Even if tomorrow were giving us debt, we continue to produce deficits as a country. This must change to stand on our feet

83280794944155648.text: "The last thing the country needs right now is the elections"

83279296424185856.text: "First stop the budget surplus - stop spending more than we produce"

83277756477083648.text: "From this crisis there is the unique opportunity to change Greece, and if we ignore it, history will be judged very hard"
